turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order three small pizzas. One with chicken and red peppers. The other two should be all the veggies, and I'd like them all thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small thin crust pizzas, 2 veggie lovers and 1 chicken and red pepper, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
